messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can representatives of a servitor race do to frighten off investigators?
They can act as assassins, messengers, spies, and delivery boys.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should be done to meet Outer Gods and Great Old Ones?
They should be met with exceedingly infrequently.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the list of servitor races?

The list includes Byakhee, Dark Young of Shub-Niggurath, Deep Ones, Fire Vampires, Servants of Gla'aki, Star-Spawn of Cthulhu, Formless Spawn, Hunting Horrors, Nightgaunts, Rat-Things, Sand-Dwellers, Servitors of the Outer Gods, Shantaks, Spawn of Ubbo-Sathla, and Tcho-Tchos.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a representative of a servitor race capable of in a confrontation?
They can bulking out confrontations.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can representatives act as?
assassins, messengers, spies, and delivery boys
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How should Outer Gods and Great Old Ones be met?
exceedingly infrequently
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Are there any specific servitor races?
yes, including Byakhee, Dark Young of Shub-Niggurath, Deep Ones, and more
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can independent alien species hold their own against Great Old Ones?
yes, some are able to hold their own, though power and association vary
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the true history of the Earth according to Lovecraft?
the true history of the Earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What species flew to the Earth at the dawn of the Cambrian age?
the elder things
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What species did the elder things push back to Antarctica?
Antarctica
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What led to the near-extinction of the elder things?
The ultimate revolt of the shog-goths
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was taken over by the Great Race of Yith from its indigenous cone-shaped beings?
Their minds
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long ago did the Great Race of Yith escape their doom?
About 50 million years ago
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What event led to the near-extinction of the elder things?
The revolt of the horrible shog-goths
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who imprisoned the terrible flying polyps?
The Great Race of Yith
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did the fungi from Yuggoth establish their first bases on Earth?
About a hundred million years ago in the Jurassic period
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What event trapped the star-spawn of Cthulhu?
It sank beneath the surface
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did the fungi from Yuggoth establish their first bases on Earth?
About a hundred million years ago.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the star-spawn of Cthulhu after they conquered a vast reach of land in the primordial Pacific Ocean?
They were trapped when it sank beneath the surface.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of beings are the mi-go?
They are referred to as the fungi from Yuggoth.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the relationship between ghouls and humanity?
Ghouls seem related to humanity in some fashion.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the primary locations for human mining colonies?
the tops of certain mountains
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who shares the planet with humans?
deep ones, ghouls, and a handful of mi-go
